desc: Alarm Clock App For IOSBasic Functionality:App create a single alarm to wake up to custom alerts (video or audio)Alarm Creation:The user can set one alarm only that is set to repeat at same time everyday.Alarm packs:Alarmpacks contain multiple individual alarms some of the alarms are free and some are paid (Audio or Video) these are stored in in AWS (DynamoDB and S3). User can purchase or add the alarm pack for free giving the access to only the free alarms within the pack or they can purchase giving them access to all the alarms in the pack.Individual Alarms:The individual alarms contain the media information to playRequirements for app development:•	Create alarm clock app in IOS (Swift) must meet app store requirement for app approval.•	UI must meet design specifications of apple.•	Support for portrait and layout modes (If required)•	Streaming of Audio and Video from DynamoDB table Connected to S3 when searching new alarm packs to add.•	Purchasing Of alarm packs.•	Downloading of free and purchased alarm content (Audio or Video) to phone so it can be used in alarms when no internet connection is available.•	Ensuring alarm content can be used in the app only.•	Checking for user purchases and redownloading of alarm content in case they get a new phone or uninstall then reinstall the app.•	Creation and scheduling of alarm (Including handling of•	keeping the app alive while alarm is set just like Rise App and The Rock Clock app do please see the following link for more information about keeping alarm apps alive [url removed, login to view]•	Querying of alarmpacks table via DynamoDB global secondary index to retrieve alarm by category efficiently.This is for information only a more detailed design document will be provided on successful application, also please view the wireframe UX design document to get a better feel for the app (Note small changes in UX may occur as the wireframe document is not a final design).
title: IOS alarm clock app with custom audio and video notifications

desc: Aim/Object:We are a looking for a conversational agent using Voice API's using Natural language and speech interaction to perform and run a basic script in a given travel usercase with an option to run a online search for information not covered by our scripts.We require the prototype conversational artificially intelligent agent/app that users can interact with using natural language like they were interacting with a human.Users can either use voice and textual input or the traditional UI interaction paradigm, to operate ormake use of the app. Using the UI (User Interface), users can interact with the app by either tapping on the screen or using voice commands (natural language) through the microphone.The app will output/display action responses using some UI Cards (UI elements & layout), text andspoken words/speech, to guide a user as he/she interacts with the system.The app/agent will be able to answer questions and also questions regarding the usercase already scripted with the option for us to be able to easily add new use cases or any other specified domain.All UI elements outside the scope of the prototypes aim/objective will be presented as a dummynon-interactive UI.
title: Travel Concierge Voice App

desc: Hello I have ready my wordpress system, I need app to connect and configure the app to memberships system with api sales.3. 1.1 Business: Payments - In-App PurchaseGuideline 3.1.1 - Business - Payments - In-App PurchaseWe noticed that your app offers a subscription with a mechanism other than the in-app purchase API.Please see attached screenshots for details.Next StepsTo resolve this issue, please revise your app to ensure that the subscription for products used within the app is offered using the in-app purchase API, with the exception of the content specified in guideline 3.1.3 of the App Store Review Guidelines.In-App PurchaseIt may be appropriate to revise your app to use the in-app purchase API to provide content purchasing functionality.In-app purchase provides several benefits, including:- The flexibility to support a variety of business models.- Impacting your app ranking by consolidating your sales to one app rather than distributing them across multiple apps.- An effective marketing vehicle to drive additional sales of new content.For information on in-app purchase, please refer to the following documentation:In-App Purchase for DevelopersIn-App Purchase Programming GuideFor step-by-step instructions on in-app purchase creation within iTunes Connect, refer to In-App Purchase for Developers.Request a phone call from App ReviewAt your request, we can arrange for an Apple Representative to call you within the next three to five business days to discuss your App Review issue.To request a call and ensure we have accurate contact information, reply directly to this message with a contact name and direct phone number to reach you.On occasion, there may be apps on the App Store that don't appear to be in compliance with the App Store Review Guidelines. We work hard to ensure that the apps on the App Store are in compliance, and we try to identify any apps currently on the App Store that may not be. It takes time to identify these occurrences, but another app being out of compliance is not a reason for your app to be.
title: Membership Iphone app(using wordpress system)

desc: I need an Android app. I would like it designed and built.This is an apps which monitors students quiz for each subject. Most subjects have many chapters, and the subjects have to take a quiz at the end of each chapter.Each quiz has 100 questions.We will need a progress bar on our website to control the average of each subject that the student has accomplished so far; before he answers all the answer completely. Besides, the status of the progress bar must be saved somewhere if the student doesn’t have chance to answer all the questions for the subject that he has chosen.  The status of progress bar must be saved before the user signing out. Once the user signs in back the system must send him automatically back where he was while he was answering to the question before signing out.@ Cant work if offline too.
title: Education Quiz Apps

desc: I am a medical student passionate about public health and pursuing a career in Global Surgery with a focus on low and middle income countries like Cameroon, my home country. One issue which exists in low and middle income countries is the fact that when a patient goes to a clinic one month and then goes to another provider another month, it becomes really difficult to know what care the patient has received. Sometimes, illiteracy and language barriers further complicate this problem.My solution to this is to create an app and/or a credit card which can be swiped by the healthcare provider to look at the patient's files. I am thinking of it in the way that Square cash and card readers which can be plugged into phones have worked. I also think it would be helpful to be able to have this information registered in some sort of database which can be accessed by providers to keep track of their patients and monitor trends or patterns.
title: Design an app for healthcare information storage
